item.name: 各機能操作
item.appendix: Fn + A : Ctrl + F7 (Toggle Tab Control Targets)
Fn + M : Ctrl + F2 (Focus Application Menu)
Fn + S : MISSION CONTROL ('S'pace, Next to the 'D')
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::QUOTE, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
item.appendix: Fn + F : Cmd + Ctrl + F (Full Screen Toggle)

item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::FN, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L
item.appendix: Fn + RETURN : HELP (for Windows Insert Key)
Fn + COMMAND + SHIFT + ] : Cmd + F1 (Windows Change for Same Application)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::F1, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.appendix: Fn + SHIFT + ] : Ctrl + F4 (Windows Change for Same Desktop)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::F4, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
item.appendix: Fn + COMMAND + SHIFT + \ : Ctrl + F6 (Focus Floating Window)
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::BACKSLASH, ModifierFlag::FN | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::F6, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
